ai-ya6.1.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-ya6.1.1:2.1_0: There are three (volitional) processes: verbal (volitional) processes, mental (volitional) processes, and mental processes.
ai-ya6.1.1:2.1_1: in-breathing is a physical process, placing the mind and keeping it connected are verbal processes. Perception and feeling are mental processes.
ai-ya6.1.1:2.1_2: apart from the mind and thoughts associated with the consciousness associated with the mind
ai-ya6.1.1:3.1_0: Volitions expressed by way of body,
ai-ya6.1.1:4.1_0: Volitions expressed by way of body,
ai-ya6.1.1:5.1_0: (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech, (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech.
ai-ya6.1.1:6.1_0: (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech,
ai-ya6.1.1:7.1_0: a (volitional) process expressed by way of the mind.
ai-ya6.1.1:8.1_0: volitions expressed by way of mind.
ai-ya6.1.1:15.0.1_0: Taking the ties of the uplands, the root of a tree,
ai-ya6.1.1:15.1_0: Volitions expressed by way of body,
ai-ya6.1.1:16.1_0: (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech, (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech.

ai-ya6.1.1:19.1_0: (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech, (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech.
ai-ya6.1.1:20.1_0: Choices are a (volitional) process expressed by way of the body,
ai-ya6.1.1:21.1_0: (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech, (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech.
ai-ya6.1.1:22.1_0: volitions expressed by way of the mind.

ai-ya6.1.1:25.1_0: a (volitional) process expressed by way of the mind.
ai-ya6.1.1:26.1_0: (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech, (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech.
ai-ya6.1.1:39.1_0: Choices by way of body, speech, and mind.
ai-ya6.1.1:40.1_0: (volitional) processes expressed by way of body, (volitional) processes expressed by way of speech,
